name: Death Waves
description: These zombies chose the wrong day to get out of their mom's hot spot. Kill them and survive to waves !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel I3 or Amd FX-6350 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 ou Amd FX-8350 Or Better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 TI or AMD R9 280X or Better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 8 GB available space
